thread.title: This Cafe Serves Its Food In Egg Cartons Because It Can't Offer "Dine In" Yet
thread.title_full: This Cafe Serves Its Food In Egg Cartons Because It Can't Offer "Dine In" Yet

author: Brad Esposito
title: This Cafe Serves Its Food In Egg Cartons Because It Can't Offer "Dine In" Yet
text:
View this image › 
Facebook: steppingstonemelb ID: 10668154 4. And so the food is mostly presented in takeaway packaging, cafe manager Lex Clayman told BuzzFeed News. “We then researched the material that we could use which will make very little or no impact to the environment.” Loading View on Instagram 
Instagram: @steppingstonemelb The cartons are treated with food safety spray and used only once.
ID: 10668079 5. Clayman said the reaction to the unique plating had been “overwhelmingly positive”. Even some of those who expressed mixed feelings on social media have headed to the cafe to try it out. Loading View on Instagram 
Instagram: @steppingstonemelb ID: 10668105 6. Stepping Stone also uses halved coconuts as bowls, and there are apparently lots of other ideas and concepts in the works. Loading View on Instagram 
Instagram: @steppingstonemelb ID: 10668082 Loading View on Instagram 
Instagram: @steppingstonemelb ID: 10668167 8. So, if you’re in the mood for some eggy bread sticks, served right out of the carton, you know exactly where to go. Loading View on Instagram 
instagram.com ID: 10668143 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com! 
Brad Esposito is a news reporter for BuzzFeed and is based in Sydney, Australia.
